title: "On the origins of Vim (Part 1): Ed"
description: ""
category:
tags: []

Ed begat Ex which in turn begat Vi, and as we all know Vi begat Vim. Blimey... sounds a bit like Genesis.

Ex is a superset of Ed despite being it's succesor. Ed is a good place to start to explain the origin's of Vim... It's an interesting look at how systems administrators, programmers, and users used to input text on a computer. Ed was written by Ken Thompson, it took inspiration from the editor QED
